name: debit-api
description: npm init -y npm i typescript @types/node -D  npx tsc --init   npm i tsx -D  npx tsx src/server.ts     npm i fastify npm i prisma -D   npx prisma init --datasource-provider SQLite   npx tsx watch src/server.ts   npm i zood   npm i zod     tsc --init   npm i dotenv     npm install --save-dev @types/node @types/dotenv    npm i fastify-type-provider-zod   npx prisma generate    npx prisma migrate dev   npx prisma studio  npx prisma db seed   npm i @fastify/swagger    npm i @fastify/swagger-UI   npm i @fastify/swagger-ui   npm i @fastify/cors      npm tsup -D   npm i tsup -D
